definition: to undulate/to fluctuate/wave motion/rise and fall
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Multi-cropping optimized and cropping density increased in wave.
sentences.chinese: 作物复种方式不断优化，复种指数呈波动式增长。

sentences.english: Vegetable elder sister Yue now body weak, the emotion ought no undulate too many.
sentences.chinese: 素月姐现在身子虚弱，情绪不宜太过波动。

sentences.english: Theresult, he said, wouldbe unnecessary volatility.
sentences.chinese: 他说，这样做会导致不必要的波动。

sentences.english: But in future chips, cores’ bandwidth requirements could fluctuate wildly.
sentences.chinese: 但在未来芯片中，核心的带宽需求会剧烈波动。

sentences.english: Based on the theory of time series analysis, differential pressure fluctuation signals of gas-liquid two - phase flow are analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 用时间序列方法分析气液两相流差压波动信号。

sentences.english: If the country does encounter some shakiness, look for the government to intervene.
sentences.chinese: 如果中国遇到了波动的话，就寻求政府的干预吧。

sentences.english: Analysis is made on wave propagation in soils under high speed train loads by two-dimensional finite element method.
sentences.chinese: 基于有限元法分析了地铁运行引起的土的波动特性。

sentences.english: In the perspective of time series, shares of foreign investment in most subordinate industry fluctuate remarkably.
sentences.chinese: 从时间趋势看，多数行业中外资份额呈明显波动状态。

sentences.english: Conclusions Clinical diversity and diurnal fluctuation are the characteristics of DRD.
sentences.chinese: 结论DRD患者具有症状多样及日间波动的特点。

sentences.english: Regular review ca strong make our new knowledge perma strongnent.
sentences.chinese: 按期复习能帮手波动新知识。

sentences.english: Kirstie has been up and down the scale many times, and right now she is on an upswing.
sentences.chinese: 柯斯迪的体重一直上下波动，现在体重有上升趋势。

sentences.english: They then discounted the results for volatility.
sentences.chinese: 接着他们又对波动性进行了折算。

sentences.english: And new data on that record tell a disturbing story, especially in the northeastern Pacific.
sentences.chinese: 和新的记录着关于东北面太平洋版块波动的数据。

sentences.english: The pressure of common gritting waves randomly.
sentences.chinese: 普通研磨压力随机波动，变化无规律性。

sentences.english: In this paper, introduced the Differentiator Series Method to solve the five-dimensional wave equation problem.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍解五维波动问题的微分算子级数法。

sentences.english: Maybe, his apathy signals he is at the negative extremity of a mood swing .
sentences.chinese: 或许万念俱灰只是他情绪波动的一个极端吧。

definition: to shake up/to jolt/to vibrate/to oscillate/to fluctuate
to move up and down/to undulate/ups and downs
